definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
to deepen (e.g. a ditch)/to extract/to manage/ladle (old)

sentences.english: Yu from East Jiangzhou down to the Three Gorges, Three Gorges will begin dredging project.
sentences.chinese: 禹從江州東下來到了三峽，便開始疏浚三峽的工程。

sentences.english: Dredging is only a temporary solution to this problem.
sentences.chinese: 疏浚解決河口淤積問題只治標。

sentences.english: The water depth in the dredged area and the volume of the lake were increased.
sentences.chinese: 疏浚區水深增加，湖容擴大，提高了草海的調蓄能力。

sentences.english: There is a sandy bottom to dredge.
The independent-developed 3D simulation system for terrain and cutterhead was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了自主研發的三維地形與疏浚絞刀仿真系統。

sentences.english: Here in Changshu, by last week most rivers had been dredged.
sentences.chinese: 在常熟，到上週大部分的河流都已疏浚完畢。

sentences.english: Dayu dredging on the legend of the Three Gorges, the ancients are the trust.
sentences.chinese: 對大禹疏浚三峽的傳說，古人大多是相信的。

sentences.english: The canal would soon fill up with mud if not regularly dredged.
sentences.chinese: 這條運河如果不經常疏浚，就會淤塞。

sentences.english: Using two forks, dip the flour-dredged fish into the egg mixture.
sentences.chinese: 使用兩個叉，蘸蛋液入麪粉疏浚魚。

sentences.english: The depth of the river is maintained by dredging.
sentences.chinese: 通過疏浚保持河道的深度。

sentences.english: Pressure on the finless porpoise population on Poyang Lake comes from the high numbers of ships passing through and sand dredging.
sentences.chinese: 壓力對江豚人口鄱陽湖來自大量的船隻通過，沙疏浚。

sentences.english: Authorities are dredging a channel to allow river traffic to resume.
sentences.chinese: 有關部門正在疏浚河道，恢復河道交通。

definition: to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
